      int CertificateService.generateCertificates()
      Generates certificates according to the rules: - Each vehicle type specifies the number of attended-and-passed training hours needed to get the certificate for that vehicle type - The mechanic has to accumulate at least that number of hours in one or several courses - A course specifies the % of training hours devoted to some vehicle types

    • Uses of BusinessException in uo.ri.ui.cashier.action

      Methods in uo.ri.ui.cashier.action that throw BusinessException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WorkOrderBillingAction.execute() 
      void UnchargedRepairsClientAction.execute()
      Process: - Ask customer dni - Display all uncharged breakdowns (status <> 'CHARGED').
      void PayOffInvoiceAction.execute()
      Algorithm: - Ask user invoice number - Retrieve invoice info - Display invoice info - Check is unpaid (status <> 'PAID') - List payment methods accepted for the customer - Ask user to type amount to charge in each payment method Check that sum of amounts equals invoice amount - Record payments in the DDBB - Increase total for each payment method - Decrease money available in coupon if any has been redeemed - Finally, mark invoice as paid
